description:
A Death Army soldier comes to tell Domon that he is to meet with Master Asia alone at the Tokyo Tower. Domon goes, but along the way is stopped by his four friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Wappen des Kriegers! Lebewohl, Shuffle-Allianz
La marque des guerriers ! Adieu, Alliance Shuffle
Senshi no Shougou! Saraba Shuffle Doumei
戦士の称号! さらばシャッフル同盟
